postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Three cute and playful kittens, born and raised by their ex-stray mother in my house, are ready to go home with you! 
 
Ebony - Sweet and vocal girl with a sleek, black coat.  
 
Patches - Beautiful Tortiseshell girl with unique patterns on her belly.  
 
Jules - Laid back ginger boy. 
 
They are all playful, curious and active and will grow up to be loving and affectionate cats once you bond with them. 
 
All 3 have been vet checked, dewormed and vaccinated. 
 
 
If you wish to adopt them, you will need to: 
 
1. Sign an adoption form. 
 
2. Pay a $100 DEPOSIT(not fee) which will be RETURNED IN FULL once your kitten is sterilized at 6 months old. 
 
3. Keep them strictly indoors and cat-proof the house. 
 
4. Provide them with quality wet and dry food and adequate veterinary care. 
 
To experience the joy of bringing home a friend for life, do contact me at: 
 
Email: 
  show contact info
title: 3 Cute Kittens for Adoption

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
I'm leaving Singapore and need a good home for my pet turtle (red-eared slider). The turtle is 5 years old and was purchased from a Pet Lover's Centre here in Singapore when he was about thumb-nail sized. He is now about the size of a grown man's hand but is very gentle and easy to care for. He comes with an aquarium, cage (easier to clean), and feeding bowl. All for free to anyone who will provide him with a good home. Good pet - he only requires being fed once per day, and having access to a sunny area for part of the day so that he can sunbathe.
title: Moving - looking for home for pet turtle - FREE

Coat Grooming 
Need little maintenance. Brushing once in every week is sufficient for their low-shedding coat. 
 
 
Exercise 
Gaming sessions that involve running, chasing, and jumping are required for this agile and active breed to burn off its excess energy. Toys like cat trees should be provided to satisfy its jumping and pouncing instincts.

Hi fellow pet owners, 
 
 
 
 
 
My name is Sylvia. 
 
I have 2 lovely small dogs and my passion is what brings me here. 
 
They are very friendly. Both sterilized, up to date vaccinated, on fleas and ticks prevention. 
 
It will be great if they can make new friends time to time. 
 
 
 
I am providing home boarding services, pet sitting, dog walking or any kind of pet related services. 
 
As I have experience working in a Vet Clinic, I am able to lend a helping hand to those in need. 
 
I am able to syringe feed food and water, provide subcutaneous fluid, feeding of medications and supplements. 
 
As I am doing this for passion, I am committed in providing best home care for your beloved pet. 
 
 
 
 
 
I am reachable at 94747242,
